reviewText: 9 y.o. loves his first Jordans. Very nice looking sneaker with good ankle support and padding. navy color scheme goes with a lot.

These are a hard shoe to buy for the first time, because they are a little stiffer than other sneakers, so the kids aren't used to them.  also its hard to measure the foot and see how they fit from the outside, since the plastic toe cover makes it harder to feel around for the end of the toe.  however, these are the only shoes I buy my daughter for her school uniform.  in general, I hate all white sneakers and they usually remind me of nurses or orthopedic.  keds don't hold up more than a month or two to dirt and my kid sitting on her calves and having the top of her shoe constantly rubbing/ scrapping on the pavement/ ground.  anything canvas looks pretty rough after a few months as well, so I don't even like converse all that much, and for some reason, converse makes their big kid shoes more narrow than their toddler shoes... and I hate that.  if the big kid shoes were more rounded (instead of slightly pointier) at the tip, I would be a much bigger fan... but since they aren't, I ended up finding these shoes and LOVE them.  The leather works best for all seasons, and its easier to clean and touch up with leather dye.  They have the huge rubber toe cover which is virtually indestructible by my child (never thought I would be able to say that!!!) and they are also very good with overall support and cushioning (unlike converse which is super flat, no support).
These shoes are somewhat hard to come across online, though... and just hope I never have a problem finding them for my daughter (8 years old).
summary: bet shoe for kid uniforms for multiple reasons

reviewText: Comfortable, and adds a bit of modesty!  LOVE IT!

I bought a size medium per Amazon's sizing suggestions, but it was too large (bust measured at 32"). I could have gotten away with it and settled, but it wasn't the best fit. I contacted Half Tee through Amazon to see if I could exchange the two tops I bought for a size small and they didn't hesitate to help me. They sent me the size smalls I needed along with a return shipping label and envelope to send the size mediums back.
The size smalls fit much better and are very comfortable! I bought them to make access for nursing my baby easier and more discreet. I highly recommend these for anyone!

Thank you, HalfTee for the easy exchange and for great tops to make nursing so much easier!
summary: Ran large, exchange for correct size was seamless

I am a huge fan of Harry Potter and i love these types of bracelets so i figured i would combine the two and purchase this. First off, it is made a little on the large side. I have small wrists so it is way to big for me. I am going to try to take an end apart and adjust it myself or have my mom do it for me because she is the jewelry lady of our family. I should have just had her make me one like this but i took a gamble and bought this one instead. It is cute overall at first when taking it out of the packaging. I wore it one day for about an hour just to pick my daughter up from school and then back home and it has already lost a piece of it. The little piece between the two owls feet that connect them apparently fell off somewhere and it's now gone. I am going to have to see if my mom or me can also fix that too somehow so that it's wearable instead of having two pieces hanging off of it. Overall i am pretty disappointed in this purchase. I won't be buying another one from them which sucks because there was one other one I was considering buying for my mom after I checked out the quality of this one. It is also a little off center with all the different pieces, which bothers me a little bit because I am OCD. the braided pieces are also a little longer than the rest of the pieces so it makes it sit kind of weird. I think if we take it apart and trim them down a little bit it might be ok. The fact that I have to repair it after only having it for less than a week should speak volumes about the quality of this product though. I definitely would have to say don't waste your money, buy the stuff at a craft store and make your own. I promise it will come out much better quality.
summary: Poor quality, broke within an hour.

*****UPDATE*****

Purchased this bracelet as a gift and it's definitely as described and pretty cute. It was shipped very quickly and arrived much earlier than the expected delivery, (Early by nearly a month, actually).
The packaging wasn't really anything special, but at this price you could order multiple bracelets and use alternate packaging options that can easily be obtained for a dollar or less, and you'd still come in way under the price of some of the more expensive options that come in more luxurious packaging.
Overall, great deal for a fun little piece, and I would absolutely recommend this product and this seller to anyone looking for economical additions to add a bit of flair to their outfits & wardrobe.

These were reasonably priced and once I got them I realized they were not just cheap "knock-offs". The fit was as expected. They feel like they could take a few bumps and still be good to use. They have a gun metal type look but smoother feel. Pretty cool!

There's a reason these are so inexpensive. Because they are designed flat, and not curved with your face, they attract a tremendous amount of glare. In addition, the lens are so cheaply made they actually reduce clarity and make it impossible to do simple tasks, like view a cellphone screen. In short, everything about these sunglasses makes it harder to see. Would not recommend as daily wear.
summary: Sun Glare and Poor Lens Clarity - You get what you pay for

I adore this dress. The fit works so well on my body (smaller bust, larger hips) and the quality and craftsmanship is excellent. You won't receive some flimsy polyester blend dress; it is full flannel and the volume of the skirt is perfect. The belt is separate and is optional for your look (the dress does not have belt holders so you won't look silly if you omit it or even lose the belt). The dress is fitted from the bust and rib cage so measure carefully and if in doubt, size up. I usually wear a medium and have a full B-cup but went with a large and it fits perfectly. My only complaint, and it's small, is that the print of the flannel isn't exact to the picture - it is stronger in the brown coloring than in blue. It is still a beautiful dress but expect it to be more brown than blue. The bodice of the dress is fully lined, the skirt is not but it is not needed as it is a full flannel.

I'd give one star, but it gets two for accurate fit and comfortable material. Before I ever wore, washed, or hung up my jacket, the hem lines on the inside of the arms towards the wrist were already coming apart. The moment it was unpackaged. I decided to keep it, things are easy enough to sew together, and perhaps I received a lemon. Fast forward to one wear (after sewing the hem line in on both arms - wrist area - more securely), BOTH sleeves became detached in the middle of themselves.
Now the material is being used as car wipes that I cut out of the un-salvageable garment. I wouldn't recommend at all. The material is soft, that part was nice, but the design is completely cheap. I've never had a garment come apart like that after being unwrapped from it's plastic packaging, then completely falling a part after one wear. I'm allergic to wool, so I highly prefer poly-blends as far as work jackets go, I've never had an issue like this with any of my blended jackets. The sizing chart was accurate in sizing, it fit just fine and again the material was nice, beware of the bad design though. If you're okay with constantly sewing your clothes back together, this is the product for you.

reviewText: This is a nice cowhide belt. My husband likes his belts, so they have to his kind of style. He likes the nice looking belts that aren't like the belts everyone is wearing. He likes this belt. He likes how easy it is to adjust the belt. I can't say I have ever seen a belt like these before. I was a little confused I have to admit when I first saw it. The one end of the belt has these bumps that lock the buckle in place. The bump catch on the buckle well and doesn't move til you release it. There is a lever on the one side of the buckle to release the belt. You might have to tighten the belt slightly to release it. The belt is long and my husband has several extra inches. The belt fit nicely in his belt loops and the extra belt sits in his loops well too. The belt is also fairly flexible and not stiff. It is comfortable to wear and holds my husband's pants up well. I received this product for free for testing and reviewing purposes, and this review is based on my own personal experience using this product.

The first thing I noticed about this belt was how heavy it was.  It isn't a cheap discount store product.  I wasn't sure on the length, but it fit both of us fine.  While marketed for men, it is absolutely a unisex item.
This belt has a feature I have never seen in a belt before.  It doesn't have holes to adjust it. It is more of a zip tie contraption.  And the "zip" covers enough area that it really is a one size fits most.  It snugs down to whatever position you need it. No more poking extra holes or holes ripping through.  I have to be honest though, and "releasing" the belt had me stumped for a minute.  I couldn't figure out how to get the darn thing off!  It was simple really, there is a small lever to lift, and it releases it.
I received this product at a reduced price in exchange for my honest review.

reviewText: SO, not what the picture would lead you to believe.  Now, in no way do I expect to get clothing and put it on my size 16 body and look like the models in the pictures.  To be fair, the colors of the dress do look like the picture.  However, if you are expecting the long, flowy-ness in the picture for this dress, you will be seriously disappointed.  First, the material of this dress made me have a flashback to playing with an old parachute in elementary school P.E. class...except thinner.  You can 100% see through this dress.  Now, on to the hilariousness that happened up top with the girls when I put, er, squeezed this dress over my head.  I am pretty sure the girls think I just had a very strange mammogram.  They actually had no where to go (this fabric has no give at all) and were forced to search for any available space to spread themselves out in a way that resulted in looking like what I can only describe as a grandma who had just been sitting too close to the table with no bra on.  In full disclosure, I have more than a generous helping up there, but I cannot see how anyone with any more than a B Cup (tops!) could comfortably or flatteringly wear this dress.  There also might have been a minute when I tried to remove the dress and became worried I might suffocate with my arms straight up in the air and a ridiculous dress stuck on my face. I ordered the XXL, just FYI.  I have reluctantly included some pictures because I know how much it helps me to see clothing on real people when purchasing.  Don't look too close or laugh too hard.
summary: in no way do I expect to get clothing and put it on my size 16 body and look like the models in the pictures

EDIT 2017 - I have been wearing this thing between 2 - 4 times a month for over a year and a half now, and while it's a little disfigured from having worn it so much (happens to all belts I've ever had) it still works and looks great! Very very impressed with its functionality at this price point!

Original Review:
I have been pleasantly surprised with the quality of this belt. For the price I hadn't set my hopes too incredibly high, but the product met and exceeded my expectations. It feels durable and looks great. The buckle is nicely polished and the latching mechanism works great. I have several of these latching style belts, and this has performed just as well as the others. Once I tried these adjustable belts I could never go back. I ordered a size 32, and it fits just right. I'm sure the material is not all leather, but the belt does smell like real leather. That's a nice touch. I've owned the product for a couple months now, wearing it a couple times a week and it has held up great. So far I'm pleased with my purchase.
summary: UPDATED 2017. The company name "EazyBelt" had not inspired confidence, but I'm very satisfied.

My partner bought me this necklace as a gift several months ago. I'm kind of a quality snob, so I didn't know how well this pendant would hold up, but loved it regardless because "I'll love you for always" is a cute saying we have for each other. However, four months later after I received it and i am still highly impressed! Not only has the pendant itself kept its shine, but so has the chain. Though the chain is delicate and feminine looking, it is still very sturdy, strong, and yet shiney. I also feel as though it is the perfect length, and lays a few inches below the collar bone. I have no anxiety over wearing this necklace in the shower, to the gym, or even to bed. Previous necklaces i have had, and have spent more money for at a fine jewlery counter, would break or rust under these conditions, but this one has stayed strong. I continue to wear it everyday, and must say, its the best present I have received.
summary: Incredible quality for an affordable price

reviewText:
This is an extremely well made and beautiful piece! I was really pleasantly surprised with the weight and quality of it when it arrived. It was packaged nicely in a small gift box and arrived in perfect condition. I really like the royal blue lining in the box as it adds a nice pop of color when you open it. It also comes with a cleaning cloth which is a nice added bonus.

The disk itself is approximately 1" in diameter and the inscription is nice and deep so it can be easily read. The chain is a box chain which is very sturdy and the clasp works well. This isn't an overly feminine or masculine necklace, so I think you could give it to just about anyone.

Overall, the necklace and charm are shiny and beautiful! This would make a wonderful gift for a loved one in your life, especially for the reasonable price point! I received this product at a discount, however, my review is honest and unbiased.
summary: Beautifully made and high quality piece!

reviewText: I like this necklace, the disc is actually a bit thicker than I thought and it will hold up well. The chain also has a bit of shine to it which is nice, overall the necklace has a good weight to it. I was given a code for this product in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I was graciously given the opportunity to test the YFN 925 Sterling Silver "You Will Forever Be My Always" Graffiti Charm Pendant Necklace,18"  for free.* Im so happy to say that my package arrived safe and sound. The necklace was packaged ever so carefully to prevent scratching. Thats really important, considering that the pendant has a mirror finish. One little scratch could ruin the whole thing. It makes me so unbelievably happy when sellers take the time and effort to package their items with such care. The necklace also came inside a sleek black box, with a royal blue insert. The blue background really makes the necklace pop! I think its much nicer than your average jewelry gift box. The necklace itself is a sterling silver, mirror finished medallion on a sterling silver box chain. The medallion is quite thick and has a wonderful weight to it. Its so substantial that you would never have to worry about it bending. The lovely engraved quote is antiqued in black. I was really drawn to this necklace, because the quote is so, so beautiful. The font they use is nice and legible too. My only advice is to be VERY careful when you clean your pendant. If at all possible keep it in a tarnish preventing baggie. Its the best way to make sure your necklace stays in pristine condition. I would also only use the polishing cloth they give you. I think its made from some sort of micro fiber. I say this because, from my experience, some silver polishing cloths will leave behind very fine scratches, which can eventually change the mirrored finish of the pendant to foggy over time. Yes, you could always have a jeweler restore its finish, but it is expensive and also becomes trickier when the item is engraved and rhodium plated. It is also possible to use a dip cleaner, but over time that can remove the black antiquing on the quote. A jeweler can also restore that, but, again, it takes a fair amount of money to fix. So, in short, if you take care of it now, you will never have to worry about cleaning it later. All things considered, this necklace is extremely well crafted, has a sweet and sentimental quote, and comes packaged with the utmost care. That is pretty phenomenal if you ask me. I would wholeheartedly recommend this beautiful necklace to everyone. It is beyond lovely.

* While I did receive these items free of charge, my reviews are ALWAYS completely honest. On my profile page you will find both positive and, sadly, not so positive reviews. I will never recommend any product that I find to be subpar. That would be wrong, and my Momma and Gramma taught me better than that.

reviewText: as I expect it

I instantly fell in love with the color of this Yahoho bag the minute that I saw it.  It's a beautiful shade of red, not too bright and not too light.  I had never heard of the Yahoho brand before ordering, but the quality is really great and the size of the bag is amazing.  I am a mom to two little ones, so I often have my purse double as a diaper bag for quick trips to the store and this bag is going to be perfect for that.  As you can see by the photos, it's actually large enough that you can get a full size magazine inside the main compartment.  The zipped lift out section is great for all of smaller things that need to be carried.  Inside that compartment are a number of pockets and slots for credit cards, cell phone, etc.  I love that you can lift that compartment out because it makes it so much easier to see what you have.  The outer bag is a soft, cowhide leather with a uniquely designed braided handle and gold color hardware.  Plus, the double handles make this bag super handy for a woman on the go.  I received this bag in exchange for my honest review.  All photos, opinion and thoughts are entirely my own.
summary: Absolutely beautiful and convenient purse.  Perfect for a woman on the go.

I bought these bangles for my 17 month old daughter who is just starting to really enjoy dressing up. I wanted to get her something of her own that I thought would be relatively safe (no beads, not easily broken, etc.) and not overly expensive. They arrived in a shiny gold box. When we opened it together, her face lit up and she instantly grabbed the bracelets and easily slipped them on herself. She likes to shake her little arm around to hear the bracelets jingle and has been wearing/playing with them nonstop. They are just the right size and look beautiful on her. As long as I can keep her from losing them, these may end up being an heirloom.

I ordered the two bracelets at a size 3. They came in on time and as described by the seller. The gift box it came in  is a yellow/gold tone color. A business card was attached with a discount on my next purchase (which is always appreciated) I am starting a jewelry collection for my 7 month old daughter and i am very happy to add these bracelets to her jewelry box.

Being only 7 months the bracelets are big on her and of course will have to wait to be worn until she is a bit older. They are a beautiful gold and silver color as the seller has described. My almost 3 year old son grabbed one of the bracelets and tried it on. He was able to get it over his hand and it hung like bracelets usually do. So I would say that the seller would be correct on the sizing for this bracelet. They don't feel heavy and I think could be liked by anyone.

Only negative......Is that i should have bought the THREE bangles instead of two because i like them so much!

I received this product for free or at a discounted rate for my honest review. while my views and opinions may differ from yours I do hope this has helped.
summary: Wish I ordered the 3 instead of 2

There's also no center seam running between the butt cheeks, which I prefer in both my underwear and swimsuits, but the fit of these is such that they accentuate the butt even without a center seam.

I am SO glad I read the reviews before purchasing this! I am a slender girl (5'7'' and only 116 lbs) with a 34" bust 27" waist 35" hip. I ordered the large and the bottoms just *barely* fit my little booty. I took the crappy round inserts out of the top first thing (I will NEVER wear them) and tried it on and it was sorta loose (I'm a full D cup) but with the coverage I hope it won't present too much of a problem, especially since I purchased this bikini to give me some mobility without worrying about exposure. I have not worn it in the water yet, but the majority of all swimsuit fabrics will stretch a little when they're wet. That will probably mean the bottoms fitting more comfortably, but I may end up getting out my sewing machine and working some magic to get the top more snug. The fabric itself is soft but slightly on the thin side, and there is no lining on the inside of the butt, which is going to be a little scary considering how much white is in this print! The clasp on the back of the top is not adjustable, only the tie at the neck is. The clasp itself is a silver metal that feels very lightweight. I hope it won't break or rust, but it doesn't bend when I apply a bit of pressure so that seems like a good sign so far. If there had been a higher quality version of this that I could find I would have preferred that because I love this design so much, but I'm afraid this is definitely on the lower-end side of quality. Still, I'm happy with the purchase, and I definitely intend to get my use out of it this summer.
summary: Size up before ordering! Know what you're buying.

It has to do with the fact that it's slightly small, but also the zipper its self isn't the best quality; zipping it up without it on is a pain. Overall it's great though, I'd at least one size bigger that recommended to help with the zipper issue. At a one size fits all idea I was a bit worried because my daughter is tall and thin but these just give and look perfect on!  She is 5'6 about 105 pounds and I am 5'7" about 128 and they went on both of us just fine and no distortion to the cute little kitty ~ I was worried being so tall for a girl and with Chinese sizing they would have to stretch too much or wouldn't fit at all.  Nope ~ they fit perfect!  And with the soft, bit of stretch fabric I am not worried about them ripping and pulling easily.  I just can not get over how cute and really nicely made these are!  I will be purchasing more and would not hesitate to tell someone of any size to order these!

Can't speak for anyone else, but I try to take my reviews seriously ~ I know how much I count on them when I am buying, especially online! I received this product at a discount for my honest and accurate review, but I am not obligated to leave a positive review, nor do I receive any incentives or monetary compensation to do so. My goal is to help buyers understand aspects of an item I would like to know before purchase. I am not affiliated with any company and am a normal consumer just like you. I pick items to review that I would normally want to purchase. (I don't do reviews for things I would already deem to be junk). I would never write a review for a product that is anything but my personal opinion and I have already purchased the product, nothing changes for me based on my review, but hopefully the time I put into writing can help someone out. Please feel free to ask me a question about any of the products I've reviewed; I am happy to help if I can!

reviewText:
I purchased these tights for my pre-teen daughter. She loves Totoro and all things Miyazaki, so they were a hit. We also got the cat version. They are super cute and fit as expected. The material is thin, closer to pantyhose than what I would typically think of as leggings. The black part from toe up to mid-thigh is opaque. The upper thigh and panty area are transparent beige. The little black ears extend the black color onto the beige part for a clever design. They kind of look like socks with little ears on top in the seller pictures, so I want to be clear that they are full pantyhose. I've attached a picture of the tights in their package so you can see the black on bottom and beige on top. These tights are absolutely adorable, they are well made, and they came in the mail very fast after only a week. I ordered another pair from this seller with a cute cat ears design.

I ordered these uniwear because they had an antique style appeal, and advertised as Cotton material.
They are tighter than expected, being cotton. The material is very thin. There is no label in the garment to describe material composition, just the manufacturer Tenflyer. They are rather stretchy, so I doubt they are 100% Cotton.
There is no crotch pouch, or ass turn-out.  There is no support. They are flat front and back, depending upon the material stretchiness to accommodate the wearer's body shape.
I wanted white or red, for a more traditional or early American look, but they do not offer those colors.
I typically wear Men's Small. I ordered 3 pair of gray Medium, based on the differences in China/US sizes. Most people say to order one size up when ordering from China manufacturers.
This uniwear fits a little too snuggly and the buttons tend to pop out when I bend over. I should have ordered Large or possibly Extra Large. But based on what I have received, I'd have to wear briefs under the 'Large' or 'Extra Large' to hold the goods from flopping around. That sort-of defeats the purpose of the purchase. Even in the Mediums, I flip-n-flop, which can get uncomfortable.
The button holes are vertical, the wrong direction for proper hold. If the button holes were horizontal, they would stay put better.

I did not 'complain' to the seller, but they offered me a pair of their regular underwear because I wasn't too happy with my purchase/fit. I guess they read the reviews or shipping/packaging statements Amazon is always asking buyers to fill out?
I have purchased their 'regular' underwear (its all 'go-go' or 'club-wear' stuff). It didn't fit either, and I told them so when I thanked them for their offer.

I am debating whether to order additional pairs in larger sizes.

Update; I did order 3 additional pair of these in "Large". Guess what? They are snug too, and the buttons don't stay any better across the belly when I bend over. I got the order in 11 days, so they are getting better about post and mail.
summary: Tight, and not a fitted suit. Built like stockings.

reviewText: I took a chance with this cami just from reading the reviews. The price was right and the style was what I was looking for. There are fewer and fewer companies selling undergarments like the old school ones. Slips do double and triple duty as dresses and sleepwear. Camisoles do double duty as tanks or sleepwear. All I wanted was a pretty camisole to be used for modesty purposes. This one checked ALL the boxes! I must say I am very impressed with this cami. It's very pretty! It's true to size. I got the 36. My bra size is 36D. I love the wide lace adjustable straps. I wasn't expecting that! It fits under the arms and at the bust, not too tight. (Straps are adjustable but not stretchy.) My cami came very quickly too. It was supposed to be here by June 27-July 5 but came on June 24th! I got the beige. Looks like a good quality camisole. Now I know where to come to buy my undergarments! Yaaaay!
summary: Shipped fast and better than I expected!!!

reviewText: This review is for the Yahoho Women's Cute Double Zipper Genuine Leather Handbag Top Handle Cross Body Shoulder Bag. I got this BEAUTIFUL pink bag to match some of my outfits. Its hard to find a genuine leather bag in this powder pink color. The finish is absolutely stunning. It is made with high quality cows leather and has a smooth, shiny finish. I would not recommend getting this bag wet it could be treated with leather spray to repel. I think also if you did that and got something on it, you could wipe it down with a cool cloth and air dry and it would stay looking like new. The bag is fairly light and has a TON of room. I LOVE LOVE LOVE the outside of this bag! It almost has so many spaces that I don't need to go on the inside! It has a nice larger rectangle pocket on the outside, the back zippered pocket, and a larger front pocket. Then there is the inside, a large space with a zippered divider. It holds my iPad mini, iPhone, wallet, makeup, personal stuff, and even a water bottle. This bag is the way to go if you need organization and space! The bag has an adjustable shoulder strap which makes carrying it easy. You can also use the handle for carrying it on your arm. Thats how I carry it. It is a very classic look and makes your outfits look clean and polished from its sophistication. Also the zipper pulls add flare and are trendy! They are longer and easy to grasp and pull. The zippers are smooth and don't snag or catch. Also the base as four metal feet which if you sit it down, it won't get dirty. I LOVE when bags include that little feature since I hate the bottom of my bag getting scratched and filthy! VERY nice bag with top quality materials and craftsmanship. 5/5 stars! If you have any questions please post below and I would be happy to answer! I received a free promotional sample of this item for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: BEAUTIFUL leathers, cute design, great color

reviewText:
I purchased this shirt because I needed a semi-casual, short-sleeve button up shirt.

Pros:
- Nice light fabric, good for summer semi-casual wear
- Slim fit, not baggy
- Good length, did not have issues with it untucking
- Colored inside flap adds nice subtle touch in the sea of blue

Cons
- Check the sizing. I ordered up a size per other recommendations and it fight like I would expect the size I normally wear to fit.

Note: Many companies are offering products at a reduced price in exchange for an evaluation and review. Since many Amazon customers rely on Amazon reviews, it is only fair that reviews contain facts and all important information. (These companies are typically start-ups or off-brand trying to get evaluations done to compete with bigger names.)

I only purchase products that we need and will use. I have no interest in obtaining product simply because it is discounted and then convincing other to purchase at full price. As such, my recommendations are:
5 Stars: Meets or exceeds all stated parameters, is of good quality and value.
4 Stars: Mostly meets all standards, but lacks in one or two minor areas
3 Stars: Good, but can use improvement or is over-priced for similar products
2 Stars: Did not meet expectations, needs improvement. Inferior to similar products
1 Star: Returned Product if of poor quality and manufacturer was unresponsive to finding a solution

As such, I did receive a discount in exchange for an evaluation of this product and a review but was not compensated in any way. I hope to break down all reviews in a Pros/Cons manner and explain any faults or issues. Thanks for viewing.
summary: Nice Basic Shirt with a Dash of Color

reviewText:
Good quality material, overall it has a great look. I really enjoy the maroon color, as i think maroon matches my olive skin tone well. It is a button down shirt, and has a really sleek look. The collar is really nice, i love the red white and blue. It adds that little bit of extra flair. I didn't notice any bleed when i removed it from the wash. Colors stayed bright and none of the color ran onto other clothing.

I bought this to wear to work, with is business casual. and i was happy. Definitely runs a tad small after drying so i recommend to air dry. HEr is my synopsis on the shirt overall:

Material: 4/5
  Nice and breathable cotton. It is comfortable after a wash/dry cycle. I really enjoyed that it held onto the colors well. Buttons are solid and stitching is good.

Build/Construction 5/5
  Buttons were sewn in well. There was only one loose stitch and it was really easy to remove.

Aesthetic:5/5
  Really snazzy looking shirt. Like i m mentioned before, color is great, collar is great, cut is nice and flatters. It is A"slim fit" but to me who is slightly overweight right now, i still felt comfortable in it.

Value: 5/5
  can't beat the price at 12-14 buckaroos. Really really good deal, get it while its hot!

These are absolutely amazing. I'm quite picky about my underwear, and I've tried various brands and styles of supporters, and these are hands down the best I've ever used! It's a bit of a unique style that takes a little getting used to--very low-rise waistline, low- and forward-sitting pouch, not the traditional rear straps for a jockstrap, rather small pouch (large enough, but not much extra room and you can't dress up, because of the low waistline). But, after a few minutes the first couple times wearing them, I got used to the style and they don't feel weird anymore--in fact, I can hardly feel them at all. They're super comfortable and supportive, and they require little to no adjusting, whether or not I wear them with compression shorts. I wore them to a cardio kickboxing class last night (under compression shorts) and things stayed in place and out of the way of getting squished during all the intense moving, all with almost no need for adjusting. So I bought more that night. This morning I went for a run with them (without compression shorts, just these and running shorts), and, in terms of clothing, it was the most comfortable and supportive run I've had in recent years, probably ever: it was comfortable and felt like I wasn't wearing them; everything stayed in place; I never had to make an adjustment. These are what I've been looking for for a long time.
I don't normally write reviews, so the fact that I am speaks to how much these impressed me. They're fantastic!

reviewText: They were too small even the large and too long

One HUGE trend that Ive been noticing (and finally decided to get on board with) this spring is Palazzo pants. These lightweight, comfy pants are perfect for Spring and Summer and have a ton of different ways to be styled. You can pair them with flats, wedges, sandals just about any shoe. I would NOT recommend wearing these pants with sneakers and if you're a shortie like I am then I would suggest wedges  the higher the better as palazzo pants can swallow us.
Crop tops, long flowly tops, fitted tops  there are so many choices. I personally love how high waisted some of these pants can be so I can wear a crop top. Im not super skinny so it helps to hide a little bit of bulge. I was asked if I would like to review a pair of these awesome pants and jumped right on it.
As you can see I chose a gorgeous print. Im not sure exactly what to call this print but to me its very India inspired. Its black pants with white designs and a few pops of red. SO perfect for summer and for pairing with a black or red top.
Now on to size. I ordered a large because thats as high as it goes and they DID fit, however they were a bit tight on me. I like my clothes fitted but I do like to be super comfy so I would have preferred a larger size just to be on the comfy side of things. The length was perfect for me. I have another pair of this style of pants and they are wayyyyyy too long. You want these pants to be long but not so long that they drag on the ground and get the bottoms all dirty.

reviewText: very happy with product.

I initially read all the reviews before purchasing and decided to go ahead and give it a try.  After several weeks, I can tell you that everything I read was pretty much on point...

The positive:
1 - It definitely makes your waistline look slim while you are wearing
2 - It does improve your posture (because it will actually hurt if you don't stand/sit up straight.

The negative:
1 - Cheaply made.  The rods broke through the fabric and nearly stabbed me.
2 - It does bend at the end.  Some like the fact that is reaches the lower abdomen, but when you sit, it bends at the bottom sometimes causing an embarrassing bulge.
3 - The rods hurt.
4 - After a while, it begins to loosen and it forms a bulge through your clothing.
5 - It smells terrible.
6 - I wore it for several weeks and my waist looks the same.  Perhaps, I needed to wear it longer to see the effects but sadly it did not last.
Just as expexted, and I can tell now it's going to work out perfectly.

reviewText: Much too heavy to wear

Now I know "Wide Sweep" should mean the lounger seriously flairs out; something I didn't think to consider before I purchased, which is odd because I try to consider every detail before making online purchases (drives my family crazy!). I'm 5'8" and the hem comes to my ankles, which I like. The long length is nice, and no problem to walk around in, but this much excess fabric in a lounger this length is a serious tripping hazard when walking up stairs with an armload of laundry.
This is knit, which was not in the description. In fact, when the description has at least two phrases that include the word "airy," tells you the fabric is "cool and comfy," and states "...although the skirt is full, it never feels too heavy!," one gets the impression the lounger is airy, cool and comfy, and lightweight. With the VAST amount of heavy knit fabric the lounger is, well, very HEAVY. If you're looking for something airy, cool, and lightweight then this is not the right lounger.
I was busy folding this back up for return so didn't look over the seams and general construction but the quality seems just fine. I'd give it three stars, because quality is pretty good, but I felt the description was misleading so it gets two stars. Now I have to pay to return this and I hate that - I feel like giving it one star but am trying to be objective.
*EDIT: The return wasn't so bad and I knew the risk by not ordering Amazon Prime. By using the return sticker in the package it looks like the company paid for return shipping and then will deduct $7.50 from my refund; the postage on my end would have been more (it was a heavy package). I think if I'd printed and used the label provided by Amazon on processing my return I would have had the $7.50 return fee as well as paying for return postage. I could be wrong.
summary: Voluminous Amount of Knit Fabric Makes for One HEAVY Lounger!

reviewText:
This is very pretty but definitely different than the one in the picture, which is obviously Free People. It is extremely similar but there are some major differences. One being that it is nowhere near as long. It's more like a tunic than a dress. Second, the embroidery and design is definitely different. In the photo the design comes all the way to the bottom ruffle. The one you will recieve does not. The design is well above the bottom ruffle. Third, the back V is much much higher than the one in the photo. It is not a deep V at all but it does have the same beaded tassel.
The embroidery design is definitely more crammed together than the one in the photo. It's pretty, but almost looks a bit messy somehow.
I ordered a Large but received a Medium. It fits, but it is more fitted than I wanted. The Large would have been perfect.
Also, unlike the one in the photo there are two black cords that hang from either side. These cords have beaded tassel ends. I'm assuming the point is to tie it in the back, somewhat like a halter tie. I guess you could also leave them loose. They don't look bad though.
I could never wear this as a dress since the bottom ruffle falls right at the bottom of my bum so if the wind blows or I bend over my entire bum would be exposed. For reference I'm 5'6 136 lbs and a 34C and the Medium does fit, it's just definitely more of a fitted look than loose through the torso. I hope the picture helps in giving you an idea of where the back V is and how the front actually looks.
Also, it is lined but the lining is that silky, crinkly, noisy kind of lining. I may put in my own lining and remove this one, I haven't decided. It does make it a bit warmer and more like blouse if that makes any sense. For the price it's not bad, but it most certainly isn't Free People quality.

reviewText:
My son is super picky about his underwear, and he's constantly throwing other brands away because they fall apart after multiple wears and washes.
He said that this pair is very well made, the stitching is great and yet they aren't stiff or uncomfortable. He said he loves the stretch of the soft fabric and the fact that they don't get all stretched out and saggy after wearing them all day.
We ordered a Medium 32-34 for him because that's what he typically wears in other brands, but he said if I order more of this brand he needs me to go up one in size because of their snug fit.
Overall I am pleased with this purchase and would recommend to others.

So we looked on Amazon for something nicer, and we found it! We ordered a Mens XS, and it fits great. The shoulders are a little tight, so keep that in mind. I'll say that again, the shoulders are a bit tight on my son (normal height and weight) but not too bad that he has trouble moving at all. I was a bit nervous reading some of the reviews, but we had no issues! All the buttons were sewn on, jacket is made of nice canvas-y type material, sewn nicely. The only thing I had to do was widen one button hole on the detachable hood and cut a hole for the other two (they were stitched, just not cut out. So, easy to do.) My son loves it. I think it's well worth the money spent!

Jewelry maintenance and precautions:  First.it's the Best maintenance method is to wear every day, due to body oils can make Gold/Silver natural warm luster.  Often wipe with a soft cloth to make it new and shinny.  All kind of jewelry should be removed for Laundry bathing to prevent jewelry products.  Avoid contact with hairspray, perfume, skin care products together. reviewText:
I absolutely love these BlueVega Women's Heart Shaped Earrings.  They are dressy enough to wear to a formal event, yet they will look great with any casual outfit as well.  I am not one for big bulky or heavy earrings, so I was very happy that they are very lightweight and don't weigh your earlobes down.  They are very secure, no backs needed.  The earrings have a hinge at the bottom and they connect into a hole in the top that locks in to keep them secure.  They come in a very nice decorative drawstring bag that makes them a perfect gift, no gift wrap needed.
I was provided a sample for free to review and and share my unbiased opinion, I am not affiliated with this company or compensated in any way. I am just a regular Amazon customer who shops a lot on Amazon and enjoys sharing my experiences with others so that they can make an informative buying decision.
summary: Classy earrings perfect for formal or casual outfits

reviewText: Good quality hat. It stood a little taller than I liked, so I ended up ordering their low profile model and like it better but this is still a very serviceable hat and I wear it often.

For all of my adult life I thought I couldn't wear baseball caps. Even at their largest, every one-size-fits-all hat I tried on would be tight and look comically small on my giant head. Then one day, I discovered that you could buy larger fitted hats online. My life is changed for the better.

This hat fits well. The elastic band keeps it secure on my head, but not uncomfortably tight. The material is heavy and the entire hat seems sturdy and well made.

No product is perfect, and even on five-star reviews I normally try to address a products flaws, even if they are minor. On this hat though, I can't think of anything bad to say.

One note: the product description for this hat is lacking, and it might be easy to miss in the photo. The underside of the bill is white. Not a bad thing, just something to be aware of.

I really liked this one. Compared to bikinis, it's a bit on the tight side, however, it covers my mom belly (two big babies back to back) nicely, and is very flattering, so I'll take the tight. Plus, the padded cups really made my breasts look nice. (Which is a huge plus, because that's hard to find after nursing both those babies.)

Really the only downside is a warning for you all. DO NOT PUT THIS IN THE DRIER! Not on gentle, not on cold air, not ever. Just don't. My husband was being nice and did a load of swimsuits and beach towels for me after I brought the kids to the river for a day. Didn't listen when I asked him to line dry mine. Completely destroyed it. The whole suit shrank three sizes, except the part that crosses over the breasts. That part managed to lose all it's elasticity, so now it hangs loosely, and won't stay in place.

I tried getting it wet and slowly stretching it back out, but it's just hopeless. I'm going to have to trash this one. But I loved it enough, I'm buying another to replace it. :) Drier incident aside, this is seriously the most flattering swimsuit I've ever had, and especially good for my self esteem with my mom body.
summary: Amazing swimsuit, but one warning for an easily avoided issue.

reviewText: Fit real well but after a few washings the spandex stretches out and they become a poor baggy fit. Don't waste your money. Get the classic fit. They hold there fit.

Usually, with jeans, everything is a compromise. Either you get sturdy, heavy, good looking jeans that are murder on your body, or you get comfortable elastic waistbands and paperthin "denim" that won't hold up past a few hard wears (not to mention the fact that they're ugly!). I'm a trucker, I love my jeans, but I spend a lot of time sitting so I NEED my clothing to be comfortable. I wasn't sure about these advanced comfort jeans by wrangler, but I loved my cowboy cuts, so I decided to give them a try. Best decision ever.

For starters, you really won't notice much of a difference between these and the cowboy cuts in terms of how they look. Both jeans sport a natural mid rise waist, seven belt loops, a zip fly and leather patching on the back right side. Unlike the cowboy cuts, though, these jeans are a combination of heavy denim and spandex. The 1 percent spandex allows the jeans to move and shape to your body for maximum comfortability. You'll literally feel like you're wearing sweatpants, but you'll get the style and durability of a great pair of jeans. The hold up very well too. I've put these jeans through hell and they've proven to be just a durable as my more expensive trousers.

A word to the wise: size DOWN when you buy. My natural size is 36 at the waist. With these I buy a 34 (33 in relaxed) and let them shape around my frame. They're extremely tight for a day or so but after that the spandex does its Job you've got a great pair of comfortable jeans.

They're stylish, flexible and best of all comfortable. I've also loved wranglers but with these jeans right here they've got a customer in me for life!
summary: The most comfortable jeans youll ever wear

reviewText: The shoes are made of stiff false leather, and they hurt quite a bit when they dig into the backs of your ankles unless your socks are enough to pad it. I ordered a women's nine (which works for me almost everywhere else I purchase shoes) and they were slightly large on me, but if I tie them tight, they don't slide off my heel when I walk. You pretty much get what you paid for. I think these are good if you want to try out the creeper style without dishing out a lot of money for nicer ones. I have only had mine a few days so I cannot speak for the longevity but considering what I paid I am overall satisfied and would definitely consider purchasing again. I would recommend these shoes to anyone who wants to try this style of shoe but wants to stick to a budget, as nicer ones can get very pricey quickly.
summary: Cheap stiff leather causes some irritation, otherwise satisfied.

This little shirt is oddly cut.  In a U.S. size, I'd take a 12-14, or a Large, so I ordered an XL here.  The body of the shirt fits generously, but the rest--not so much.

When I first opened it, I thought it might be too large, but then it was surprisingly hard to pull on, I think because of the narrowness of the shoulders.  Once it's on, the bottom of the shirt isn't wide enough.  It fits so snugly that it doesn't really drape--it's just kind of stuck there, where it's too tight.

Since I usually wear my shirts tucked in, I can work around this, but for others, it might be a deal-breaker.  The description does have an accurate measurement for the bottom of the blouse for each size, but keep in mind that it must fit over your pants or skirt too.  The bottom of the XL is 42" by my measurement.  Also it's sheer enough to require a camisole.

But overall, it's pretty. I do like the look and feel of the fabric and the white and blue starred print.  It would be good under a suit jacket.

I gave it 5 stars because, for the money, it is beautiful and made much better than any other $3.78 shirt you could buy. The Amazon photo is exactly what you are sent, so no guessing game as to what will come. Asian sizing is much different than U.S. sizes because Asians are on average, shorter and frame-wise, more petite. Also, do not expect this to come in a week. It takes about a month, so plan accordingly.

reviewText: I Love this watch, Winding up the watch takes you back before watch are run by batteries.
You get what you pay for. This is junk.

Okay, writing 4 in 'Romans' as IIII on the face is unusual these days but, believe it or not, the actual Romans apparently preferred IIII to IV. And many clockmakers use IIII.

The watch - came as a 'for review' item from Mudder - was cool enough for our daughter to 'like' it. She wants to wear it, actually. Because it's black, the skeleton construction is 'see through' and... it's black. It's also heavy so you could call it Steam Punk Heavy Metal. And you do need to wind it manually, daily, more or less.

Be aware that the band is fit for some 'extra large' wrist so budget in a few more dollars you may have to spend to have it adjusted to fit. Other than that, yes, it's mostly decorative but it's cool-looking, it's quite accurate maybe losing one minute every 4-5 days, will never need a new battery and it's dirt cheap for a mechanical watch of a decent quality.
summary: Skeletons R Us and We're Good Romans Too

I depend very heavily on reviews that are posted on Amazon. I also read what reviewers on Amazon have to say. I want to help others by providing my reviews that detail the product as well as the experience I have with the products that I get on Amazon. This product was received for a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. Although some people may see this as a negative thing and say companies are buying good reviews, I would encourage those people to consider another viewpoint. Many people will not buy a product until there are a few reviews posted about it. I applaud these companies who put their necks out on the line, so to speak, to reviewers like me who will truly be honest and unbiased. Reviewers like me develop a reputation as well, so we are motivated to remain honest and unbiased. I have given products a 5 star review and I have given products a 1 star review.

5  I love it
4  I like it
3  Its okay
2  I dislike it
1  I hate it

A good company will look at the reviews and sometime change their product or price based upon the reviews. Certainly, there are those professional reviews that are not honest and unbiased; however, I hope there are not many. I certainly see some lousy professional reviewers out there. I can only promise this  I do my best to keep my reviews honest, so if you have any questions, please let me know.

The logo itself has a distressed look with cracks and creases, it gives it that well worn favorite tee shirt look. Overall it is a nice shirt that runs in the sizing of a relaxed fit juniors shirt. reviewText:
The watch keeps good time but the step monitoring is quite a bit off on accuracy.  It sometimes registers steps even when you're not moving.  I would say the accuracy is off by about 5-10% on the high side for total mileage/steps walked during the day. The heart rate monitor works only sporadically.

Also, the supplied instructions on how to use the various functions are for the most part written in mandarin characters and are essentially useless to those who know only English.
Simply trial and error is how you learn to operate the various functions on this pedometer watch, but for $16 what can you expect. At least it keeps excellent time.
summary: Keeps good time but not your steps/distance.

Regardless, for the price, this wristband is nice to add some variation to your wrist watches.

FUNOC Vintage Retro Unisex Cyber Goggles 50s Cool Round Glasses Sunglasses -{{THIS PRODUCT IS A GAMBLE}}- To start I would like to say that even for standard shipping, this product arrived 15 days early to my surprise. On the topic of shipping, the company that manufactures this product is based in China, so be aware, if you are a US customer as I am, there is a lot of wear and tear your package will endure before it arrives at your doorstep. To protect the glasses from this expected rough handling it is encased in a thin cardboard box, and a sub-par layer of small bubble, bubble wrap. The glasses are on the fragile side, they won't fall apart if you drop them, but the wrong kind of pressure will snap them in half. This is a concern because that kind of pressure could very well happen during shipping. Luckily my glasses arrived in one piece, but I wouldn't guarantee they might for everyone. Aside from the risk of receiving a broken product, I must say I am pleased with the quality of the glasses. They aren't extremely durable and I recommend having a hard glasses case for them. They take up a large amount of your face so people with smaller faces should take that into account. The metal is malleable enough to were I was able to gently bend the glasses into a mostly fitting shape for my face, but beware, if you use pliers to bend them it may scratch some of the finish off the metal. Overall this product cost me just under 9$ for shipping and tax included(Standard Shipping). If you have 9$ to spend and want a cool pair of sunglasses that work well to shield your eyes from the sun, and are very fashionable, then I would say these are a worthy gamble.
summary: Very Cool Glasses, Work Functionally as well as Fashionably. -{{THIS PRODUCT IS A GAMBLE READ REVIEW FOR MORE INFO}}-

reviewText:
I am currently 26 weeks pregnant and 140 lbs.  I bought a large, which is US med and it fits perfectly. I couldn't wait to try it on and now I don't want to take it off.  I may have to get the black one also.  I was originally afraid that the tank would be itchy and scratchy, and that I couldn't stand to wear it but it isn't at all.  It is super comfy and stretchy, and I love how long it is so that it can cover my growing belly.  I haven't had a chance to try it as a nursing tank but the clips seem to work well.

My only complaint is that when I washed it in the washing machine, the pads shift a lot.  I'll probably need to stitch the pad to the fabric so that it doesn't shift in the wash.  It's probably only meant to be hand washed but I don't have time for that and it's held up pretty well in the washing machine.  Also, when ordering, the product ships from China so it will take a few weeks to arrive...didn't know until it was delivered.  Since it is made in China, it's prob best to buy a larger size since Asian sizing is smaller.
summary: Great as a maternity tank too

When I order again in another color, I will order the size I think I need. I received this tunic at a discounted price in exchange for my use of it and my honest review.
summary: I really like how comfortable this tunic is

reviewText: Stanzino Women's 3/4 Sleeve Tunic is a little snug in the arms and I am glad I read some reviews before ordering and ordered up two sizes than I normally wear. I am tall and it was long enough in the torso and arms. I also like that it is lightweight, very comfortable, doesn't wrinkle making great for traveling and mine came in a rich dark chocolate. The offer this shirt in many colors: brown, black, green, blue and red. It has a v-neckline with high-low hem with it being lower in the back. The material feels very soft and silky and is made of 65% polyester, 30% Rayon and 5% Spandex. It looks very nice and lays best for me when wearing with leggings. I bought this at a discount for the opportunity to review and give my honest and unbiased opinion. When buying this, I had hoped it would be comfortable and not wrinkle. For, I wanted to use it the Stanzino Tunic for traveling to stay comfortable while flying. Well, it delivers on all I wanted with the exception of the arms being a little snug but tolerable. The richness of the deep chocolate color also thrilled me for the color helps to not wash out my skin completion as some browns do being vary fair skinned. It washes well, machine washable and dries fairly quickly. I don't dry a lot of my clothes to help preserve the clothes fabric and prevent them from fading. This tunic dried with no wrinkling or ironing needed. I did pull a little after putting on clothes hanger wet to dry. So, I recommend for comfort, color, for being easy to care for and for the way it can be dressed up or down all while being very comfortable and stylish. You can wear easily in warmer weather because of it being lightweight and then transition into colder weather layering it.  Great item to add to your wardrobe.
summary: Doesn't wrinkle and perfect for traveling because of that and how comfortable it is.

reviewText: Great accessory piece. Expensive, but unique.

his may have been the best high risk/high reward purchase I've made on Amazon. I was really interested but skeptical of how this would fit. The "you get what you pay for" was lingering in my mind as well. Once I got it in before the expected date (which was amazing), I opened the box to bear witness to a really awesome chest strap. Looks exactly like advertised. The leather, although a bit soft, feels good enough to be real leather. The strap adjustment is the best part. I'm an average sized male so I was able to just throw it on and be pretty snug in it, but it feels great knowing I can adjust and tighten the chest strap anytime without it being faulty. The center piece id absolutely astounding. The design is beautiful and industrial. The material is really metallic after flicking it a few times. The only thing I haven't been able to figure out Is the LED light in the center when you open it (which by the way, is really cool, especially when you can keep it locked with a small key attached). The seller(s) were awesome enough to include a battery for the piece; however, I haven't figured out how to place it in there. I wasn't sure if I overlooked a manual in the box but it's not too much of an issue. I'm just happy it wasn't a purchase I would regret.

reviewText:
I really needed a dress for an event I was going to, and this one seemed to fit the bill. The only problem was that no one has seemed to have bought/reviewed this dress yet. So I took a huge gamble considering that this dress is from (I think) an Asian company, and the sizes run small. My measurements were much larger than what was listed for the large's measurements. The plus about this dress is that it is STRETCHY. Yes, it stretches! Big plus! It fits nicely, and actually the top is a bit big around my chest (and I have a large chest!) but it's not too bad/noticeable. It fits like any other maxi dress, and is clingy. So if you got lumps and bumps it will show. But the material is breathable for a hot day. My only complaint is that I wish it was longer--the hem stops right at my ankles. But seeing as it is that long on the model in the picture, I knew it would stop about there.

It looks amazing online and when you get it it's going to be 4 sizes smaller than expected.  I purchased a XXL even though I where a medium and SOMETIMES a large in US sizes.  I'm 190-195, 5 ft. 10 inches. Typically athletic or 'slim fit' shirts that are cut with a taper fit me very well.  Express shirts fit great at these sizes (medium-large) for me, these are garbage.

you get what you pay for and if it seems too good to be true, you know it is.
THIS REVIEW GOES FOR EVERY SHIRT THEY HAVE, I BOUGHT 22 OF THEM AND I CAN ATTEST TO MAJOR INCONSISTENCIES
You might get lucky and find a few that fit as expected AFTER taking into account that they run 2-3 sizes small, but the shirts that JEANSIAN doesn't actually make, brands like ZYFG free, VTTSI, ZJ SM, U2M2, VKSA etc are all brands they sell on here under THEIR brand name and you don't know which ones are which until you get them.  all of these brands fit even smaller by a minimum of one size.  If you have to retern anything after the 2-3 week wait, it'll cost you at least as much again in shipping.  Keep that in mind.

WHY DID I PURCHASE THESE?
I had purchased a couple that were made by JEANSIAN first to make sure they were what they advertised and I was happy, although one was in fact 2 sizes too small, I took it as a fluke with all the 4 and 5 star reviews.  Shopping with JEANSIAN is a gamble.  I wish they were consistently sized because I would have literally spent over a grand collecting every dress garment they make.  Not going to happen.  spend $200 bucks on 3-4 nice shirts you can try on at a reputable store.
summary: You're gambling on fit if you wear bigger than a small. 3 out of 22 fit.

This does show well and I have received a lot of compliments on it while wearing it too.

This very beautiful looking jewelry came on time and packaged in a box with other items I ordered.  This comes with its own small box to arrange it in if you are giving this set as a gift.  Each piece is individually wrapped in plastic.
The stones all match each other with a uniquely cut shape.  They are light purple, see through, and catch the light quite nicely.  The necklace also has a line of diamond like stones in it that shine nicely as well.
The earrings look just slightly a bit cheaper than the necklace.  Make note that these are white gold plated, not sterling silver.  They however do not leave any green marks or irritate my ears.  Be aware there is no rubber stop for the back of these to secure them and keep them from possibly falling out.
The necklace chain seems durable and well made.  It is adjustable and the clasp is easy to work.  I did have to adjust the stone with a small bit of force to make it hang straight.
All in all, this is not a bad set.  This also comes with its own certificate.  It seems the company cares about its products.

This dress is as beautiful as it is in the photo, which is quite surprising. The style of the dress is very unique. I love the way it flows and fits to my body. I was afraid that it would be too long or too small since its one-size-fits-all. I am only 5ft, so dresses are usually too long. It touches the floor, but it isn't so long that it is bothersome.

The dress does tie around the neck/shoulder area, so you can adjust it as needed. The ruffled neckline is just so cute and adds a lot to the style. The sides are kinda low, but I don't really mind it.

The material isn't the best ever, but for the price, its very nice. Its a thin material and its smooth. It feels nice against my body. The polka dot design is just perfect. Its a great casual or formal dress. I could definitely see myself wearing this on a beach or to a wedding. Its absolutely beautiful.

I recommend this dress for anyone looking for something comfortable that flatters the body. I did receive a complimentary sample to share my honest opinion.

Honestly, this is the nicest purse I've ever owned.... or should I say purses! I underestimated the quality of this set. I kind of expected it to be kind of cheap because the pictures do not do it justice! I've even owned top of the line name brand purses that have costed me over $400 and this purse I would purchase over and over compared to those!
This purse has a really great base foundation. It's solid and it doesn't fold over. It's not stiff enough that it is uncomfortable to wear, but it hold its form if you put it down. The leather is really soft and beautiful. The color is just gorgeous. The inside of the larger tote is just the leather and it smells fabulous!
I wasn't expecting the purse that sits on the inside to be as big as it was. It also comes with a strap that's long enough to wear along your shoulder. So basically it's two purses and 1 and they're both gorgeous! The person that sits on the inside also has a beautiful satiny lining with pockets and a zipper pocket. This bag combo is so pretty and so spacious that I'm able to keep my makeup bag, diapers, wipes and wallet without it getting too bulked up and it still looks great and stays organized! I would highly recommend this purse set!
I received this purse at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I love them, but beware of the sizing.  I am an apple-type, with plump fat thighs.  I wear a 22P (tight on my waist, fit my legs) or 24P (comfy on my waist, but saggy baggy on my legs) in Wal-Mart's Lee Wranglers.  I bought a 3X in these, the pants slid down my butt, as if my butt wasn't there.  Trust me, my butt was still very much there.  I bought a 2X, a little bit better, but I had to constantly pull them up all day.  If you are a 22/24 in Lee Wranglers, try the 1X size first.  If I am a 1X in these pants, I imagine most apple-type women are too.

The pants are buttery fluttery and flattering.  I feel like a girl again when I'm wearing these.  I wear shirts that cover the camel toe & the backside, because these pants will show a pronounced crack otherwise.  They are thin-ish, but if the weighed much more even the 1X would fall down.  I wear my black ones to work & they looked great for a business casual office any day of the week.  They have lasted many washings so far.

Trying to figure out if this skirt is a keeper or not. The one I received does not have any garment tags at all so I have to take the item description's word for fiber content and sizing. It seems that what makes it a size "small" is the waistband. I like the length, I'm 5'4 and it comes right above my ankles which is perfect as I like a  long skirt for sun protection but don't want to be tripping over it. The waistband elastic is uncomfortably bulky and snug, like the waistband on a cheap pair of jogging shorts. The fabric itself is soft and lightweight and it's certainly a flowy skirt but not flattering to the behind - there is a seam that goes down the rear that makes it drape somewhat frumpy and the pockets make the hip area bulkier than an otherwise nice hand to the front. It's affordable, a beautiful color (rich bright burgandy) and would be comfy except for the waistband and since I am not entirely sure of the fabric content I don't know what will happen when I wash it (if I don't decide to send it back). It's annoying to suffer a too-tight waistband to an otherwise frumpy looking garment - the skirt does flow and swirl when I move around and may hang nicer on a taller person. It's functional as I said I love the color but isn't the perfect summer skirt I was hoping for.
summary: Lovely color, soft but not sure of fabric content or sizing.

reviewText:
Women's bodies do not come in three simple sizes, so whenever I see a garment only offered in small, medium & large, I'm immediately suspicious. If the vendor doesn't accept returns, I'll usually pass, no matter how cute the dress/blouse/romper in question is. But I took a chance on this, and I'm glad I did- the small fits perfectly.

That said, I'm usually an extra small- or even an xxsmall. So if small is your go-to size, you might want to order up, because this small likely won't fit you. The waist is remarkably snug- and this garment has no give at all. For reference, I am 5'0", 95 lbs, with a 24" waist. I suspect the manufacturer is using asian sizing.

It's very classy and I think it has a lot of potential. It will be an amazing dress once I'm done with it.
I have been using it for my daughter, Who sits in a wheelchair every day

The head hole was a tight squeeze, but I have a massive noggin. And I expect the tight fit will help keep water from running down my neck. There are zippers to allow your rear view mirrors to go through, those zippers are very cheap. Based on forecast this item will get a thorough workout in the coming days will update afterwards. Update March 8, 2016: Rode the mile home from work today in a light to moderate rain. Poncho performed exactly as it should. The bottom two or three inches of my pants were wet but that is a far cry from other products I've tried that left everything below my waist soaked.

The part that was too small was the hood, either I have a very big head or this was made or a kid, but the rest of it was huge.  I returned it, otherwise it would have been a great poncho for walking the dogs in rainy weather.

I was looking for a dress to wear to an early evening spring wedding in less than 2 weeks, and wanted something comfortable I could wear again that was longer length, formal, but not too Va-Va-Voom. I loved the look of this dress, but for me, ordering clothing online has always been a shot-in-the-dark. At only $49 though, I felt I should take the chance just in case the stars aligned and this dress was as amazing as everyone said it was! I decided to order it in blue and hope for the best! I've had 3 children, so I was a little worried about how tight the midsection would fit with the ribbon banding I saw around the waist and hips. But this dress is nice and stretchy with NO ZIPPER, is very forgiving, and ridiculously comfortable! I am 5'7" tall & 130-135 lbs, small (B) bust... ordered a Small, expecting it to likely be gaping up top and too short like most dresses I try on. It arrived on Prime 2-day shipping, and when I tried it on I was SHOCKED at how beautifully it fit, and how much give it has. It is so comfortable I don't feel like I'm even wearing an evening dress! I'm ordering this dress in black as I write this review... If you're thinking about ordering this dress, DO IT.
summary: GORGEOUS, and a PERFECT fit! For under $50!!

My son has another pair of Nike athletic shoes purchased from the (Kohl's) store, costed less that this ones, is using them for a year now, and still look good (except getting small on him). These socks are warm and definitely comfortable. The only reason for the 4 star rating is that they aren't super snug-meaning they slip down towards my ankle a little bit. That being said, I would still recommend them and the price can't be beat.

Pros:
Tight stitching
Bright colors that won't bleed in the wash.
Stretches to multiple sizes.
Long lasting!

I purchased these socks for my daughters.  They fit perfectly for all 3 girls.  Their shoe sizes range from size 4 in women's to size 10.  The stitching is tight and the fabric has enough give and stretch for multiple shoe sizes.

I have one daughter that will wear a pair of these nearly every day, so they are constantly getting washed.  She also wears them outside (not my preference) and they have held up to her abuse.

As inexpensive these socks were, I was worried the dye would bleed in the first few washings, but that was never the case.  It has been nearly a year since I got them for my girls and they are still holding strong.  The colors have not faded after many washings and are still vibrant.

Overall our experience with this brand is 100% positive and I would recommend them to others.  They have lasted nearly a year so far and are still going strong!
summary: These socks are vibrant and strong!

I ordered this shirt in a 2XL which is my normal size for these tee shirts. A 2XL will usually fit OK for me although for some shirts they are too large so I have to drop down to an XL. The 2XL was too baggy and the neckline was too wide. So I ordered another one in an XL which was too tight. Both of these shirts are tailored like a garbage bag with a hole cut into it for the neckline. The XL had the additional feature of looking like it had been washed 100 times before I received it. So as an experiment I ordered another 2XL from Super Hero Stuff. That one fits totally different. The neckline is OK. Although strangely the one they sent me has the same artwork on the front and back which is yet another defect but at least it fits OK. This is telling me different sellers are shipping different versions of this shirt. Generally I think there's problems with the quality control for these sublimated shirts. I have received some where the artwork is blurry like the shirt was moving around when they applied the artwork. Then I got this XL with the dull colors. I get the impression that some sellers are rummaging through the dumpsters and shipping out the rejects that the factory threw away. People who order this shirt would not know about all of this unless they ordered it from multiple sellers as I have. As it is right now I have a 2XL that fits but with the same image on the front and the back. I can't win with this shirt. Skirt is a little short - It falls just below my mid shin and I'm 5'5.5". The fabric left something to be desired. It was a synthetic fabric, that's for sure; polyester, I believe. But the kind of polyester that's reminiscent of a table cloth, like it could be wiped clean with a damp towel. It fits me, but I probably can't put on anymore weight and have it still fit. The top isn't perfect, but the side-boob I get from it looks good and it wears in a way that I will not be flashing anyone. I can't wear a bra with it, not even one of those front-only bras as it would show on the side. It will need to be washed first to get the square packing wrinkles out of it before public wear. Over all, the outfit is flattering, it's fun, and believe it or not, I think it makes my back fat look sexy! I look forward to wearing it this summer.

reviewText:
Cute dress! However there are a few issues with it:

1. It is a very thin material so it is pretty see-through on the white part. Definately will need a slip or something else under it!

2. It is less baggy on the top than it shows in the photo. However, I am large chested (36DD) so that isn't a crazy revelation but still a little disappointing.

3. The material is very clingy, I was expecting something more like cotton. However, it is polyester, which is clearly stated in the description now that I look at it. I'm a little disappointed because the polyester clings a little more to my waist than I would like.

Some Pros:

1. High cloth on the top means than even with a larger chest it doesn't show cleavage, even when I am bent over which is a big deal since I have a little one to pick up :)

2. It is literally the PERFECT length for me. I am 5' 4" and it hits the floor perfectly with a pair of dressy flats. It also fit very well but the pinched part at the waist is not uncomfortable!

3. Bold and clean lines/colors. I was expecting the white to be a little more ivory but it is bright white :)

4. The material means that it doesn't wrinkle and it dries quickly, making it a great dress to wear for a walk on the beach :)

This dress would be perfect for a day at the beach, a daytime date or just a quick way to dress up your day. It would look great with your hair down or up, with jewelry or not, with heels or flats. It is a perfect go to piece to have in your closet, as long as you have a slip to go with it.
summary: Perfect size but a little see through!

reviewText: Thos sleeveless dress is adorable on and so comfortable. The elastic drawn in waist gives you a nice figure. I love the chevron pattern on the dress. It is such a nice spring/summer dress that can be casual or dressy. The fabric is so soft, comfy, and flowy. The fabric does have a little bit of stretch. Now sizing is a tad smaller than typical sizing but the stretch in it gives you a little wiggle room. I normally wear a medium dress and this medium is a tad small but the elastic and the stretch of the fabric allowed me to wear it ok and the length is a little on the longer size for me. I'm 5'3" and the dress drags the ground even with shoes on. The stitching seems strong and sturdy and after washing it hasn't shown any signs of wear. I love it so far! *Product provided at a discount for my honest and unbiased review and inspection. All opinions are my own.

Appears to be a very good "non-OEM" alternative.  Appearance is just about identical to the original Luminox band on my Luminox 8822. MI watch.  You have to look very closely to see any differences.  Has nice black metal buckle, same textured pattern, same dimensions and details as the original.  Fits perfectly.  Upon close inspection you will see that there are no metal inserts in the pin holes as on the original and there are no Luminox brand markings on the band.  Overall quality looks to be very good for a non-original branded item.  Another nice plus is that it included a pin removal tool and a set of new pins.  I would rate it as an excellent value for the price I paid.
summary: Very Good Alternative to the Original Band

reviewText: i ordered these a little over a month ago, and received 7 of the 8 pairs that come in the set. I contacted siikworld and informed them about it, and they shipped me the blue pair i was missing, their customer service is just outstanding and awesome, very polite and friendy, as for these briefs, i absolutely love them. I am a size 32 medium, so i ordered a large, and they fit wonderful. They are well made, soft feeling, and skin tight, they are very supportive and comfortable with a fully functional 2 button buttonfly. The back is almost full coverage, you will possibly have some butt cheek hanging out like i do, the front is very very low cut, however, they do stretch in the front just a little. I would rate these a 5 star, however, due to the very bare minimum of space in the front as you can see in the pictures, they get a 4 star rating. Over all, i am very pleased with these briefs, and will definitely order more from siikworld in the future.
