A Stunner! Comparable to Sheri Hill dress. Well worth every penny (we paid $142). Looks very expensive and appears to be well made. No loose gems, has even sewing +. We got the white, and I gasped as I pulled it out of the bag. I couldn't believe how pretty is was. For reference on size, we got the size 4, my 16yr old daughter is 5'3" and 115lb. Skinny waist, wears size 1 in hollister jeans but larger busted, 32D. The cut of the dress works so well for her figure. I did say it was somewhat large as compared to other dresses we would normally need a size 6 to accommodate chest. The 4 zipped up perfectly. We will have to have it altered at the neck as its too big there. and the she would like the length to be shorter. It comes just to her knees but being 5'3" most dresses are long on her, so we will pay to have that alteration done as well. The beading/gems are beautiful. They have an iridescent glimmer to them. As the light catches them, they appear to be pastels such as pink, pale blue and lavender. Originally she was going to wear red shoes, red flowers and have date wear tie in red. But the pastel look of the gems wouldn't match that. A pink shoe and flowers would be cute but she is opting for a rhinestone silver shoe and get white flowers to add to the snow princess look of the dress. Will update with pics. Happy to answer questions
summary: A stunner! Don't hestitate to order this dup for a Sheri H*ll dress. Looks to be worth 2or 3times the cost

I needed to order some compression socks for an upcoming trans oceanic flight/trip which I will be taking and searched high and low to find the right pair.  I came up with the Travelog Luggage Compression Travel Socks.  I am a woman and wear a size 8 1/2 M shoes so I chose the Medium size in these socks and they worked out perfectly.  These travel socks have no wool in them which is what I wanted as I wanted to be able to wear them not just in the wintertime, but more or less year around.  They have just the right amount of compression and I enjoyed wearing them around the house so much, that I decided to order another two pairs in the Black shade as well.  They really do make your legs feel great.  They were easy to get on and I feel the quality is great.  The only thing I will worn you is that take a look at the socks in the picture and note how the deeper tone (patterned color) comes up on top of the foot...it may be of some concern to you depending on whether you care if anyone notices it or not, it doesn't bother me since the comfort and quality are superior.  I would without hesitation recommend these Travelon Compression Socks to anyone who travels or needs good compression socks.  I got the best price right here on Amazon and shipping was fast.
summary: COMPRESSION SOCKS THAT WORK AND WEAR

Like the other reviewers stated, it's definitely not made for small chested girls because it fell right off of my daughter as well, which is my only complaint.  Luckily, I have a mother-in-law who is a whiz at the sewing machine and was able to alter it to fit her perfectly.  I also kind of wish it would have had some kind of straps to better hold it up, but overall, we are pleased with our purchase.

Costume jewelry was once considered junk but is now a sought-after accessory because it is seen as a way to make a statement.  Seen in this light, the statement you would be making is an openness to Eastern culture (this bracelet definitely has a modern Asian feel to it) and lack of fear of colors.  The brightly colored beads on the bracelet are definitely cheerful.  Another plus side to the multitude of colors is that the bracelet goes with just about anything.

The clasp is particularly clever.  It is a wedge in one of the beads that says Love.  When I first looked at the bracelet, I thought there wasn't a clasp at all; thats how well hidden it is.

I think this is a lovely bracelet and could make a great gift for a young girl who is just starting to wear jewelry.

Disclaimer: I received this bracelet free of charge in exchange for an unbiased review.
summary: Lovely Bracelet for a Young Girl

reviewText:
I love this dress! The material is so soft, stretchy, and comfortable. Also, the model in this picture must be very tall because the dress hits me about right at the knee or a little above (I'm 5'4"). It's very easy to dress it up if you're going out dancing during the weekend or to cocktails with a friend- or you can dress it down and pair it with a jean jacket or frumpy sweater. It's so comfortably I could wear it to bed.

I also have a relatively small bust, and a lot of times dresses that are cut at the top (like this one) are WAY too low. I don't have any of those issues with this dress.
summary: Soft, comfy, fits well and isn't that short.

reviewText: After reading reviews on this dress from other sellers, I expected this dress to be a good length for me because it was short on a lot of people (I'm 5'2", 112 pounds, 32A bust, so things tend to be big on me). The dress was actually longer than I thought it would be. It was down to my knees (about 32-33 inches from shoulder to hem), which is kind of an awkward length when you're short. However, I really loved the design of the dress, which is true to the pictures, and the softness of the material, a soft but thin swimsuit-like material. It's very comfortable and overall a really pretty dress! I'm only giving it 4 stars because I didn't anticipate it being so long - it's fixable but just a little bit of a hassle.
Loved it

This is SUCH an adorable long sleeve. Though I must warn you it does have a spandex/poly feel to it. So it can cause you to get pretty warm when the sun comes out. However, it's super comfortable, but it doesn't have as much stretch as you would expect for the way it feels, which will keep it from getting stretched out. The craziest part is I have SUPER long arms and these were still a decent length compared to most long sleeves. The sewing is great and there are no loose threads or off sewn seems. This is super cute with all of the Disney princesses featured AND well made too. I did receive this product at a discounted rate for my unbiased review, but I never guarantee a positive review, only a review the product deserves. I am 5'5" 98-100lbs collegiate dancer and ordered a small in hopes of wearing these for practices & workouts.
PROS:
- Soft, extremely comfortable & good quality fabric!
- They are snug high waisted (higher than pictured if you ask me.. I have high mid-torso belly button & these just cover it leaving only the top of my belly ring showing) which is nice for those "I ate too much" days but the waistband can be rolled down to your desired coverage & will not un-roll!
- MUCH thicker than your basic spandex since they are made of mostly cotton meaning NO showing underwear or butt cracks & (my favorite) NO over-exaggerated camel toe!
CONS:
- The thigh length on the picture seems to be accurate for when you first put them on but they do ride up slightly as to be expected leaving just the veryy bottom of my butt cheeks popping out when extensively moving around but that's a norm for my teammates & I even in our collegiate nike dri-fits so if it bugs you I would suggest ordering a size up.

reviewText: Works great. Have gotten several compliments.

This is such a great wrap towel! As my mom pointed out, they are such an easy thing to make, but the quality of this one made it well worth the cost. First of all, it actually is a thick, very absorbent, high quality towel. Second, the elastic around the top seems quite sturdy. Third, it is VERY generously sized--I'm 5'6" and it does go to my knees and I'm a busty size 20 and it still had room (and overlapped plenty), so it makes me feel comfortable--not feeling like the towel isn't covering me or it's going to fall off me. I got this for after swimming and aquatic physical therapy, but I've ended up using it every day after I shower as well! I'm very impressed, and though I worried about how much I was spending on it, it is WELL worth $25, and I may need to invest in a second one. The polka dots are adorable, too!

I am 5'5 130 lbs, 36C. I think it says Large on the tag. I usually get a medium in dresses, but a large fits perfectly. I love this dress, fabric and fit. I wore it on a lunch date with a black tube bra just below the elastic chest area as a belt with black heels and a black necklace and bracelet. Adorable and it was a hit with my boyfriend.  I was getting compliments from complete strangers in the elevator on the way to the restaurant. The drop shoulders make the necklace stand out. It's a bright red with navy blue, so if you have navy blue accessories, blue would work too. In the photo, the fabric kinda looks like a little girl dress, but the hemline hits me two inches above the knee and with the black accessories the fabric looks appropriate for an adult. The fabric is similar to that of umbrella fabric as far as thread count and hardness, but does not scratch, itch, and best of all, does not wrinkle. It can make you a little sweaty, so don't wear it in the heat of the summer unless you will be in air conditioning. I also wore it with a denim jacket and black boots and that was very cute too.  Another day I wore it with white Keds sneakers for a very casual look. Add a white cardigan and it makes the casual look very modest. I can see this as a beach dress too. Would definitely buy again. This is going to be one of my travel dresses due to the light weight, wrinkle resistance, easy laundering, and versatility in how it can be worn.  I will always handwash to keep the elastic chest area fully intact for as long as possible. Need to check the listing again to see if there are other colors I may want.
summary: Love this dress, the color, and lightweight fabric.

I am an earring freak. I love to collect all kinds. I even buy them for all the holidays so I can show off a little flair now and then. Because I wear a uniform to work my options are limited as to what I get to wear on the personal side of things. Earrings are one thing that I can wear to add a little fun to my day. When I came across this trio, I knew instantly that I had to have them. Not only is this a 3-pack of earrings but it is also 3 different designs as well. I have always seen ear cuffs before but never had the chance to get any. What makes this set unique is the fact that you have a regular earring that attaches to an ear cuff via a simple short chain. So, not only do you have an earring but also an ear cuff. The cuff part, while not technically adjustable, can be maneuvered to your specific comfort level. I don't really like the type of backs these come with but they are easily replaced with whatever you want. All of them looked just like the picture and I like the fact that the daisy set (MY FAVORITE) is a little darker than the other ones. I really love this set and I know they will get a ton of use on my ears :)

Amazing, well-made, super classy luggage. Looks even better in person! I've received multiple compliments on it. 20" size is perfect. No trouble fitting it in overhead bins and I'm able to pack for a week long trip in it. Rolls easily, wheels never get stuck/drag. Good design-- it has not tipped over once, even packed full. Pull up handle is nice and sturdy. The clothing straps are also well made and keep your clothes in place. I'd def buy this again or as a gift.

Beautiful luggage built with quality materials and components. I was in the market for a cheaper alternative to a Rimowa and this fit the bill, while being much more affordable and still fashionable. Most rolling luggage utilize zippers which are prone to getting stuck or malfunctioning, this clasp system on the Ambassador works more effectively. 20" is the perfect size to be stored in an aircraft overhead compartment and is lightweight enough to be maneuvered without too much effort. Wheels glide smoothly across any surface and swivels with ease when rotated. There is a slight discrepancy with the Amazon product description; It says 5-years warranty, but the tag on the luggage states a 3-year warranty.

Love these stockings

I wear a 1X at Torrid, and ordered the "Plus Size 1X/2X" stockings. When they arrived, the package said "suitable for 150-200 lbs". That is not 1X/2X - the average 150lb woman is a size 10. But I carried on anyway.

The stockings stretched ok, but there is no way that they would stay up. Without a garter belt, they rolled down to my knees immediately. With a garter belt, the edges still rolled heavily, so you don't get that smooth line like the picture. There is no grippy texture on the thigh, they are literally just hose pieces.

They are also non-breathable nylon. Not like regular pantyhose. You get NO air inside the hose. My legs were sweaty and all the sweat just stayed in the hose with me. Gross.

All in all, they are ok for light novelty wear. But not all-night costume quality.
summary: Too small and not breathable at all

reviewText:
These gloves are the perfect balance of dainty and sturdy. They are the perfect balance of functional and stylish as well. What I like the most about these gloves is that they have covered tips on the thumb and index fingers. This allows for me to use my smartphone without removing my gloves which is very clever. The gloves look great and are a perfect match to the color on the listing. The style is perfectly stretchy and comfortable. In the end is cut to fit most sizes. I know because I have huge hands and they fit me well. The details on the gloves are beautiful as well. There is a flower on the side of the glove with a pearl in the center. That accent adds a little bit more class and makes it a little more like a tea glove and appropriate for wearing after driving. The gloves are beautiful and a great fit and buy.

Please note that I received these gloves at a reduced rate in return for an honest and unbiased review. This unbiased review is my own honest opinion after wearing the gloves for myself.

reviewText:
I bought these Touch Screen Lace Cotton Gloves by Vbiger for my wife who thoroughly enjoys old fashioned clothing and accessories. These gloves are absolutely beautiful and she loved them for the following reasons. First, they are breathable. Other pairs of dress gloves that she has worn cause her hands to sweat inside them. Not a pleasant experience. Vbiger's gloves did not do that. Second, the sizing is accurate. My wife has a size small hands. She is often frustrated when she buys gloves and they are more like a medium than a small. Not so with these gloves. They are true to size and fit her hands perfectly (as you can see in the picture). Third, they are comfortable to wear. Fourth, they are beautiful but functional at the same time. The top of the gloves are made of lace while the bottom parts are a different type of material to allow them to be worn and used without tearing. Each glove has a flower attached at the wrist that completes what my wife describes as a truly elegant pair of gloves. Extremely pleased with this product. Highly recommend to others. These gloves would be great for vintage attire, Halloween costumes or to wear to special events.

I was provided this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest unbiased evaluation.

The gloves have a beautiful rose design on the top and the bottom has grippers, a touch screen on the forefinger and thumb, and breathable areas to keep the sweat in control. This soft, cotton and spandex material permits the material to be breathable and stretchable to fit all hands sizes. Wearing these while driving is made easy by being able to grip the steering wheel well. Thus, it keeps your control of the steering wheel, without slipping, at all times. The touch screen on the forefingers and thumbs permits one to use their smartphone with ease. You can move your screen, text, and maneuver through all areas of your phone. I love this added function to these gloves. Your hands look elegant yet they are able to be practical when worn. The seller also includes a ziplock storage style bag for clean and easy transportation of your gloves. These are very elegant and stylish yet useful and practical. They come in several color varieties for your choosing. These are by far my favorite gloves so far. I will be buying other colors, too. I received these gloves for a reduced rate for my honest and unbiased opinion.

Look chic and elegant, while still being able to use your phone or tablet.  These gloves are lovey and well made.  They are a light shade of gray and have an alluring look with roses in the see-through pattern of lace on the top.  On the bottom is a light, breathable mesh with the fingers and thumb having tiny gripping dots so your phone won't slide right out of your hands.  Another wonderful feature is the integration of metallic threading on the tips of the index finger and thumb on each glove which allows you to easily navigate your touch-screen phone without having to take the gloves off.  I have winter gloves that have this feature, but it is awesome to have the capability to use my tablet and phone while wearing gloves during the warmer months.

Each glove has a beautiful flower appliques, with pearls in the center, on it's outer edge.  I am very pleased with the quality and care they were made with.  The stitching is tight and even.  They are very light and comfortable and will spice up the look of your outfit, while allowing you to easily use your mobile devices.  I received this at a discounted rate, in exchange for my honest, unbiased opinion and feedback.
summary: You Don't Have To Take These Off To Use Your Touch Screen Devices!  Chic, Elegant & Very Comfortable!

TyBM5qFr.dpuf

These looked really fun to wear by looking at the picture. I like how they look like knee highs and tattoos. I also like that there are quite a few different styles to pick from. I've always been fond of star tattoos, so I thought these would be nice to wear. They are pretty cool for a costume or even for everyday wear. They are made from good hose material. I'm mentioning this because I've bought pantyhose in the past that were so thin, and would tear the second my nails got anywhere near them. I have really long nails and although I try to be super careful when putting any pantyhose on, my nails usually end up snagging them pretty badly. I didn't have that problem with these and I would have been pretty sad if that had happened.
The color of the "skin" area with the tattoos is a bit lighter than my skin, but they still have a nice look to them. I honestly didn't think anyone would think they were real, but someone actually asked me if they were tattoos. I laughed and said no, but they told me the pantyhose were cool either way.
They do fit me a tiny bit snug, but I just had a baby a few months ago, and haven't lost all of the pregnancy weight. Normally this size would fit me perfectly. I'm losing weight slowly, so I'm looking forward to them fitting me better in the next couple of months.

Let me start off by saying that when these arrived, the looked really cheap and like they probably would look terrible on me. Well, looks can be deceiving. I tried them on with a cute mini skirt and a white and black striped blouse and they looked great! I had a bit of a period where I was unsure about them because the "skin" color part of the leggings seemed to look unnatural, plus I have thigh tattoos already and I was afraid that the tights would make my tats look distorted. The entire reason I bought these particular ones is because they looked like thigh highs with a garter.

They sort of do, but the "garter" looking part is only on the front and not on the back as well. Granted, all the other designs are supposed to be that way because they are to look more like tattoos on your thighs.

Overall, I really do like them. The looks sort of grew on me a bit and I look forward to using them for photoshoots and my cosplays. And my husband definitely approves of them!

This tunic is one of my favorites. Really nice fabric, a little stretch, but not too much, and it's never clingy. Loose enough thru the waist to hide a tummy, but not enough to look like a maternity top on me at 5'7". Plenty of room around the "chest", too! The length hits me right at the hip socket. Perfect! I don't ever have to worry about tugging it down. The fabric is light enough for Texas summers and thick enough for our spring & fall. The color is just like in the photos, Nice bright blues, deep blacks. It makes my blue eyes really pop, too! I LOVE wearing it. It's really flattering! Washes very well, too. If I had anything sorta bad to say about it, the upper arms are a little bit snug, but I'm got my grandmothers upper arms, lol. God got me back for making fun of the sainted woman behind her back, lol! It won't be a problem as long as you've got normal proportioned upper arms. Regardless, it's still my fave, not a big deal.  I came back to this to buy other colors, but see that only this color is listed now and it's currently "unavailable". When they bring this tunic back, I'm buying a duplicate, just in case... I may go to their website, or check their catalog to see if I can find it there.

Please note... Some critical reviewers say that clothing from Woman Within clothing all fit too large. Do yourself a favor and check their size chart in the description, not Amazon's which is a generic size chart. Woman Within clothing is designed for the bigger girls, not the lucky ones who enjoy a normal weight. On a normal sized person, one who's not a bit over weight, of course they'll fit big. On those of us with a bit of "cushion", they've got a perfect fit!  If a man goes to a "Big & Tall" shop, do they write reviews stating that the clothing is all too big & tall??

I Absolutely love this company, and their products. This tunic is nothing less than stunning. My only "should probably mention..." is that I am 5' 00" , and I will end up hemming these about two inches. As a five foot tall woman, they look like pregnancy smocks if I don't hem them. Once hemmed, I get tons of compliments about how beautiful these tops are. If you are 5' 3" 0r taller, this product length will not be any issue whatsoever. Quality, value, and STUNNING products. Highly, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
summary: So absolutely worth their reasonable prices, for absolutely BEAUTIFUL clothes!!!

reviewText: Not good.

To start for anyone thinking about buying theses teeth please note that each one is hand made. The instructions are fairly easy to follow but if you have trouble you can go to their website for a video tutorial. Next these teeth are professional quality so that is why they cost a lot. If you have trouble getting it to stay together in your mouth put super glue on the in between of the plastic and teeth then let dry. If it hurts your mouth then it didn't set right so put it back in hot water and set it again. Also don't forget to trim the edges of the plastic because you might have used too much. The teeth are not ment for kids but for 14 and up. Yes the teeth are sharp and no you cannot and should not eat with them in. Note that being scary can be painful so don't give this a crap review because you are to stubborn to follow directions. I work at a haunted house and have a few different pairs of this groups teeth and they are wonderful but it makes me sad to see it get a lot of hate. Lastly I want to say that you can't return them because it would be like trying to return a toothbrush that you didn't like the feeling of after putting it in your mouth. It is something they can't resale.
summary: I'm gonna repost this on all the dental distortion stuff

To start for anyone thinking about buying theses teeth please note that each one is hand made. The instructions are fairly easy to follow but if you have trouble you can go to their website for a video tutorial. Next these teeth are professional quality so that is why they cost a lot. If you have trouble getting it to stay together in your mouth put super glue on the in between of the plastic and teeth then let dry. If it hurts your mouth then it didn't set right so put it back in hot water and set it again. Also don't forget to trim the edges of the plastic because you might have used too much. The teeth are not ment for kids but for 14 and up. Yes the teeth are sharp and no you cannot and should not eat with them in. Note that being scary can be painful so don't give this a crap review because you are to stubborn to follow directions. I work at a haunted house and have a few different pairs of this groups teeth and they are wonderful but it makes me sad to see it get a lot of hate. Lastly I want to say that you can't return them because it would be like trying to return a toothbrush that you didn't like the feeling of after putting it in your mouth. It is something they can't resale.
It is junk, don't buy it, note the decimal point, in my math class you were required to put a zero in front of the decimal place, such as, 0.925 sterling.  I have the rash to prove it

I really like these Yeti for Bed PJ bottoms, but I wanted to let others know that they did shrink in the wash.  I ordered them in a small as I am 5'4" and wear a size 4-6.  Before washing they fit great and were a good length (I usually need a 31" inseam on jeans).  After I washed them, however, I did notice they shrank.  They were a little snugger in the waist (not too small, but they had fit nicely before washing - though it should be noted I like elastic waist bands to fit loose). The length is now what I would consider too short.  I was disappointed because I really like the comfort of the pants.  I will still keep them, but if I were to order future pants I think I would try ordering in a medium in hopes that they would not become too short after washing.
summary: Shrinks in the wash - may want to order up one size.

You can definitely dress this up or down depending on the shoes and accessories you pair with it. I used Prime and it showed up in 2 days when it said it would. Overall I'm extremely happy with my purchase!

Okay so I thought I would make a short list of pros/cons. Okay?

Pros:
-Nice for a casual cosplay.
-Has a general sense of the Assassins Creed look. Got some good compliments at Houston's Comic Con.
-Very sturdy despite what the others said about it.

Cons:
-It's a thick jacket. Like I said in my very short pro list. It was undeniably hot inside my house (which is kept at 68 during the Texas heat) and even worse when you mix 1000+ people in an convention together. So I'd recommend using it during a winter convention more so than a summer.
-It's a tight fit. I usually wear a large in women's clothing. However, I decided to get an extra large in mens so that my boyfriend could wear it for Halloween. IT was snug around the breast area, so if you're a C+ cup...it will be tight.
summary: Got some good compliments at Houston's Comic Con

I have  3 of these now and love the fact they  are a heavy weight cotton and while I wouldn't call it a boxy cut, it's certainly not meant to cling to your body shape.  The colors are meant to look a little faded and while I prefer more vibrant colors I  went ahead and ordered 2 more after the first one in navy  simply because of the basic cut and heavier weight.  I am 5'8", 185 lbs, and short-waisted, carrying most off my weight at my waist.  The size XL is  a perfect fit for me.  The only slight drawback to these tops  is  that after you wash them, the piping at the v-neck likes to curl a bit and if you're OCD like me, you want to touch  up the v'd neck with an iron. reviewText: Perfect!

Beautiful floral print! I was hoping that with the peach/navy floral that the navy blue would look more royal blue like it does on the picture. But it's definitely navy. Just as with the peach/jade floral, the jade really is jade green.. not aqua like it looks on the picture. Both are beautiful prints and colors, though. I'm 5'7, 150lbs, curvier, and usually wear medium. I bought a medium and large to try in the floral prints and also another medium in the White & Black stripe. The White & Black is completely different material (a bit thicker and feels more durable and like it will wash well) than the 2 floral ones, and the medium in White & Black feels somewhat tight and is a tiny bit harder to walk around and get in and out of the car in. I feel like I could use a Large. Not a huge deal. It looks great! With the floral ones, the medium fit perfect. The Large is a bit too big in the waist in the floral prints and also little longer than I like. I can wear them high waisted and the skirt still goes right below my knee. For a more midi look, wear the waist a little bit lower. I love these skirts!

I am so, so happy I ignored the sole negative comment and bought this for my pirate-themed party dress. I will agree that it is fairly thin material and somewhat transparent; I wouldn't recommend wearing it as is. However, with a petticoat and overbust corset as I plan to wear it, it is a perfect midlayer!!

For a dress under $10, I was also pleasantly surprised with the workmanship. It has a sewn in petticoat/double skirt with ruffle edge for structure, as well as a finished zipper with padded hook and eye closure. The hems are all straight and neatly finished. The fit is exactly as stated in the size chart. The color is a soft, buttery cream (not white). This dress is 10X better than the $30 one they sell at Party City. I am very happy with my purchase!
